trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.
This class is a markup extension implementation.

Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code.
This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) usage from XAML.

For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) or [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
`{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML.
You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix.
In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage.
For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md).
Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) is not explicitly necessary.
XAML Text Usage
See Remarks
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref> class, with the provided initial key.
The key of the resource that this markup extension references.
resourceKey parameter is `null`, either through markup extension usage or explicit construction.
Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

For <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref>, this is the object found in a resource dictionary, where the object to find is identified by the <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension.ResourceKey"></xref>.
This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly.
The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation.
The property to be set can be identified by a <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> (standard property) or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> (dependency property).
This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.
It must not be `null`.
In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context:
If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.
Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
The object value to set on the property where the markup extension provided value is evaluated.
serviceProvider was `null`, or failed to implement a required service.
Gets or sets the key value passed by this static resource reference.
They key is used to return the object matching that key in resource dictionaries.
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md).
XAML Text Usage
The resource key for a resource.
Specified value as `null`, either through markup extension usage or explicit construction.
